      • setXScaleAsCell

        public void setXScaleAsCell(Range range,
                            int xMinPixel,
                            int xMaxPixel,
                            ValueScale xValueScale)
        Sets the scaling data for the x axis assuming values are going to represent cells. The minimum value is going to be positioned at the left of the xMinPixel while the maximum value is going to be position at the right of the xMaxPixel.
        Parameters:
        range - the range to be displayed
        xMinPixel - the pixel corresponding to the minimum
        xMaxPixel - the pixel corresponding to the maximum
        xValueScale - the scale used to transform values to pixel

      • setXScaleAsPoint

        public void setXScaleAsPoint(Range range,
                             int xMinPixel,
                             int xMaxPixel,
                             ValueScale xValueScale)
        Sets the scaling data for the x axis assuming values are going to represent points. The minimum value is going to be positioned in the center of the xMinPixel while the maximum value is going to be position in the middle of the xMaxPixel.
        Parameters:
        range - the range to be displayed
        xMinPixel - the pixel corresponding to the minimum
        xMaxPixel - the pixel corresponding to the maximum
        xValueScale - the scale used to transform values to pixel

      • xValueToPixel

        public int xValueToPixel(double value)
        Converts the given value to the pixel position.
        Parameters:
        value - the value
        Returns:
        the pixel where the value should be mapped

        Returns:
        the value at the pixel

      • setYScaleAsCell

        public void setYScaleAsCell(Range range,
                            int yMinPixel,
                            int yMaxPixel,
                            ValueScale yValueScale)
        Sets the scaling data for the y axis assuming values are going to represent cells. The minimum value is going to be positioned at the bottom of the yMinPixel while the maximum value is going to be position at the top of the yMaxPixel.
        Parameters:
        range - the range to be displayed
        yMinPixel - the pixel corresponding to the minimum
        yMaxPixel - the pixel corresponding to the maximum
        yValueScale - the scale used to transform values to pixel

      • setYScaleAsPoint

        public void setYScaleAsPoint(Range range,
                             int yMinPixel,
                             int yMaxPixel,
                             ValueScale yValueScale)
        Sets the scaling data for the y axis assuming values are going to represent points. The minimum value is going to be positioned in the center of the yMinPixel while the maximum value is going to be position in the center of the yMaxPixel.
        Parameters:
        range - the range to be displayed
        yMinPixel - the pixel corresponding to the minimum
        yMaxPixel - the pixel corresponding to the maximum
        yValueScale - the scale used to transform values to pixel
